title: Re-skin your Hammerhead Karoo 2 GPS computer with new Custom Color Kits
content:
Hammerhead’s newest product isn’t lighter, faster, or stiffer. But it is more colorful. Perfect for anyone looking to add a colorful GPS head unit to their bike, Hammerhead Karoo 2 computers now have multiple options when it comes to Pantone. Starting with the computer itself, the new Karoo 2 was announced last August. The successor […]

The post Re-skin your Hammerhead Karoo 2 GPS computer with new Custom Color Kits appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
